Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): PIFA Heparin/Platelet Factor 4 Antibody Assay systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Heparin/Platelet Factor 4 Antibody Serum Panel, a serum QC control for monitoring and evaluating PIFA Heparin PF4 Antibody Assay systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed control intended for use as a serum QC control to monitor and evaluate precision and accuracy of the (qualitative) PIFA Heparin PF4 Antibody Assay, including both confirmed positive and negative control panel members.
